questions.question: This arc is the first in the series and introduces Monkey D. Luffy and his aspiration to become the Pirate King. What is...?
In this arc, the Straw Hat Pirates help a princess save her kingdom from a Warlord of the Sea who uses sand-based powers. What is...?
This arc features the Straw Hat Pirates' journey to an underwater island and their encounter with a fish-man supremacist group. What is...?
This power, used by a member of the Blackbeard Pirates, allows the user to create and manipulate darkness. What is...?
This Devil Fruit ability allows its user to transform into a dragon or a dragon-like creature. What is...?
questions.answer: Uo Uo no Mi, Model: Seiryu

questions.question: This technique, a staple of Roronoa Zoro, involves rapidly slashing at an opponent in a circular motion. What is...?
This character, the former captain of the Heart Pirates, is known for his ability to grant eternal youth with the Ope Ope no Mi. Who is...?
This member of the Straw Hat Pirates is a skilled swordsman who wields three swords and aspires to become the world's greatest swordsman. Who is...?
This character, a former Warlord of the Sea, is known for his sand manipulation powers and role as a key antagonist in the Alabasta arc. Who is...?
